divs: Sighting Details I SEEN TWO THAT NIGHT I WAS SMOKING A CIGARRETE OUTSIDE WHEN I LOOKED UP I SEEN A RED GLOW OBJECT SLOWLY DISAPPERED MAYBE THIRTY MINUTES LATER THERE WAS ANOTHERONE GOING NE SLOWLY HAD PULSATING RED AND CLEAR LIGHTS NO SOUND WASENT A PLANE OR HELECOPTER WHAT WAS IT YOU TELL ME I ALSO HAVE IT ON VIEDO PLEASE I NEED SOMEBODY TO LOOK IT IM GOING CRAZY
